title: HW10 - String Reversal
description:
HW10 - String Reversal

Given a string, return it with all characters in reverse order.

Examples:

  • Input: "hello"
    Output: "olleh"
  • Input: "abc"
    Output: "cba"
  • Input: ""
    Output: ""

Constraints:

  • String can be empty
  • Preserve all characters including spaces
solution_text:
String Reversal

Algorithm:

  1. Use Python's slicing notation [::-1]
  2. Return reversed string

Time Complexity: O(n) - create reversed copy

Space Complexity: O(n) - new string
verify:
def verify(actual_output, expected_output):
    """Verify the reversed string"""
    passed = actual_output == expected_output
    return [passed, str(actual_output)]
